document.discussion_title: Rituximab plus Dose-Dense Chemotherapy for Burkitt Lymphoma - NEJM Journal Watch
document.topic_text: Ribrag V et al. Lancet 2016 Apr 11. Jabbour E and Kantarjian H. Lancet 2016 Apr 11. This article requires a subscription for full access. NEJM Journal Watch articles published within the last six months are available to subscribers only. Articles published more than 6 months ago are available to registered users. Access Options
